en: 47-Event (announcement, program or report of an event such as a seminar, conference, exhibition, etc.)
Event page ofthe 2014 European Union Prize for Literature, to be held on 08/10/2014 in Frankfurt.

Date and Venue:

08/10/2014, Frankfurt Book Fair, Reading Tent, Agora, Ludwig-Erhard-Anlage 1, 60327 Frankfurt am Main

Summary:

The European Union Prize for Literature is an annual initiative tro recognis the best emerging authors in Europe.

The 2014 event will introduce a variety of authors, include Janne Teller, Marica Bodrožić (winner of the 2013 prize), Mely Kiak, Katri Lipson (winner of the 2013 prize), and Michail Schischkin.

Together, they will address a variety of questions on Europe and the European Union, while the keynote address will be given by Androulla Vassiliou, the European Comissioner for Education, Culture, Multilingualism, and Youth.

Registration:

Individuals wishing to attend can register on the registration page of the event.
Winners of 2014 European Union Prize for Literature announced at Frankfurt Book Fair
